JUSTICE ASHOK MENON TUESDAY, THE 07TH DAY OF JANUARY 2020 / 17TH POUSHA, 1941 Cr1.MC.No.8253 OF 2019 (B) AGAINST THE ORDER/JUDGMENT IN CC 1068/2017 OF JUDICIAL FIRST CLASS MAGISTRATE COURT -I,MANJERI CRIME NO.121/2015 OF Karuvarakundu Police Station , Malappuram PETITIONER/S: 1 MURATH AGED 34 YEARS S/O.MUHAMMED, VALLIKAPARAMBIL HOUSE, KUNDLAMPADAN, NEELANCHERY, TUVUR AMSOM, MALAPPURAM DISTRICT-679327 2 SUBAIR AGED 39 YEARS S/O.KOYAPPU, CHELAKODAN HOUSE, OOTHALKUNNU, ARIMANAL, MALAPPURAM DISTRICT-676525 BY ADVS. SRI.C.IJLAL SMT .UMMUL FIDA RESPONDENT/S: 1 STATE OF KERALA REPRESENTED BY THE PUBLIC PROSECUTOR, HIGH COURT OF KERALA, ERNAKULAM-31 2 THE SUB INSPECTOR OF POLICE KARUVARAKUNUD POLICE STATION, MALAPPURAM DISTRICT- 676523 3 NASAR AGED 35 YEARS S/O.MUHAMMED, RESIDING AT MANNAYATH HOUSE, NEELANCHERY, TUVUR AMSOM, MALAPPURAM DISTRICT-679327 R3 BY ADV. MUHAMMED SHABEERALI.V OTHER PRESENT: SRI. C.S.HRITHWIK, SR.PP THIS CRIMINAL MISC. CASE HAVING COME UP FOR ADMISSION ON 07.01.2020, THE COURT ON THE SAME DAY PASSED THE FOLLOWING: ial Crl.MC.No.8253 OF 2019(B) 2 2020/KERISO6 ORDER Dated this the 7th day of January 2020 Petitioners are accused 1 and 8 in Crime No.121/2015 of Karuvarakundu Police Station for having allegedly committed offences punishable under Sections 143, 147, 148, 341, 323 and 324 r/w Section 149 of IPC along with several other accused. Petitioners are absconding and the case against them was split up and refiled as C.C. No.1068/2017 on the files of the Judicial First Class Magistrate Court-I, Manjeri. The co-accused who faced trial were found not guilty and acquitted vide judgment dated 31.10.2017 at Annexure A2 and the petitioners are presently facing trial. 2. There is only one injured, who is the 3% respondent. He is appeared through counsel and filed affidavit to the effect that the matter has been amicably settled and that he has no grievance whatsoever against the petitioners. A report has been called for from the investigating officer through the Senior Public Prosecutor. The petitioners do not have criminal antecedents. There is no public interest igi eal Crl.MC.No.8253 OF 2019(B) 3 2020/KERISO6 involved. All the co-accused have been acquitted and that acquittal has become final. In the result, the Crl.M.C is allowed and the entire proceedings in CC No.1068/2017 on the files of the Judicial First Class Magistrate Court-I, Manjeri stands quashed under Section 482 of Cr.P.C.and the accused are discharged. Sd/- ASHOK MENON JUDGE cee aed a [ Crl.MC.No.8253 OF 2019(B) 4 2020/KERISO6 APPENDIX PETITIONER'S/S EXHIBITS: ANNEXURE Al THE CERTIFIED COPY OF THE FINAL REPORT IN CRIME NO.121/2015 oF KARUVARAKUNDU POLICE STATION, MALAPPURAM DISTRICT ANNEXURE A2 CERTIFIED COPY OF THE JUDGMENT DATED 31.10.2017 IN CC NO.342/2015 PASSED BY THE JUDICIAL FIRST CLASS MAGISTRATE COURT-I, MANJERI ANNEXURE A3 AN AFFIDAVIT SWORN BY THE THIRD RESPONDENT STATING THE SETTLEMENT OF ALL THE DISPUTES.
